package.file:
<?php

interface freeness_interface_applicationIF {
  function login($user, $secret);
}
class freeness {
  public static function factory($class){
    return freeness_application::singleton($class);
  }
}

abstract class freeness_application {
  public $key = "";
  private static $instance;
  private function __construct()
  {
  }
  public function singleton($className)
  {
    if (!isset(self::$instance)) {
      self::$instance = new $className;
    }
    return self::$instance;
  }
  function createLink($user){
    $d = freeness_interface_request::encodeData(
      array("class"=>get_class($this),"function"=>"login","params"=>array(
        $user->user,
        $user->secret
      ))
    , $this->key);
    return $this->url . "?d=" . urlencode($d);
  }
  function createStarter($user){
    $url=$this->createLink($user);
    $title=json_encode($this->title);
    $icon=json_encode($this->iconSmall);
    return <<<EOF
freeness.appManager.run(function(){
  var W;
  W=freeness.desktop.createWindow({
		width       : 300,
		height      : 200,
		maximizable : true,
                minimizable : true,
                title       : $title,
                icon        : $icon,
                html        : '<iframe src="$url" style="border;none;width:100%;height:100%;position:relative;top:-64px;"></iframe>'
	});
  return W;
});
EOF;
  }
  function remoteCall(){
    if(isset($_GET["d"])){
      $data = freeness_interface_request::decodeData($_GET["d"], $this->key);
      if(isset($data->class) && isset($data->function)){
        $class = $data->class;
        call_user_func_array(array(freeness::factory($class), $data->function), $data->params);
      }
    }
  }
  abstract function login($user, $secret);
}

class freeness_interface_request{
  function encodeData($data,$key){
    $dataEncrypted = base64_encode( mcrypt_encrypt  ( MCRYPT_3DES, $key, json_encode($data) , MCRYPT_MODE_CFB ));
    return $dataEncrypted;
  }
  function decodeData( $dataEncrypted, $key ){
    $data = mcrypt_decrypt( MCRYPT_3DES, $key, base64_decode( $dataEncrypted ), MCRYPT_MODE_CFB );
    return json_decode($data);
  }
}

if (!function_exists('get_called_class')){
  function get_called_class(){
    $bt = debug_backtrace();
    $lines = file($bt[1]['file']);
    preg_match('/([a-zA-Z0-9\_]+)::'.$bt[1]['function'].'/', $lines[$bt[1]['line']-1], $matches);
    return $matches[1];
  }
}

<?php

class freeness_ProcessMaker extends freeness_application {
  public $key="pm";
  public $title="ProcessMaker";
  public $url = "http://127.0.0.2/sysworkflow/en/green/freeness/freeness";
  public $icon = "../../images/processmaker.gif";
  public $iconSmall = "../../images/processmaker16.gif";
  function login($user, $secret){
    print '<script src="http://localhost/jquery/js/jquery-1.5.1.min.js"></script>';
    print '<script>$.ajax({
      url:"../login/authentication.php",
      type:"POST",
      data:{"form[USR_USERNAME]":"admin","form[USR_PASSWORD]":"admin"},
      success:function(d){
        window.location.href="../processes/main";
      }
    })</script>';
  }
}

global $app;
$app = freeness::factory("freeness_ProcessMaker");

<?php
require_once("../library/achachi/zparser.class.php");

class freeness_component {
  protected $bindingValuesId=false;
  function __construct(){
    if(!$this->bindingValuesId) $this->bindingValuesId = get_class($this);// . microtime(true) . rand(1000, 9999);
    if(!isset($_SESSION[$this->bindingValuesId])) $_SESSION[$this->bindingValuesId]=array();
  }
  function create($type,$__values=array()) {
    foreach($__values as $__k => $__v) $$__k = $__v;
    ob_start();
    eval('?>'.$this->__constructors[$type]);
    $__res = ob_get_contents();
    ob_end_clean();
    return $__res;
  }
  function render(){
    print $this->create("base");
  }
  function getBinding($name){
    $__class = $this->bindings[$name]["class"];
    require_once("../model/".$__class.".php");
    foreach($this->getBindingValues() as $k => $v) $$k=$v;
    $table=new $__class();
    $select=$table->select();
    eval(implode("",zparser::criteria($this->bindings[$name]["key"])));
    return $table->fetchRow($select);
  }
  function getBindingValues(){
    return $_SESSION[$this->bindingValuesId];
  }
  function setBindingValues($values){
    foreach($values as $k => $v) {
      $_SESSION[$this->bindingValuesId][$k] = $v;
    }
  }
  function __get($name){
    if(isset($this->bindings[$name])) {
      if(isset($this->bindings[$name]["class"])) {
        $__class = $this->bindings[$name]["class"];
        require_once("../model/".$__class.".php");
        foreach($this->getBindingValues() as $k => $v) $$k=$v;
        $table=new $__class();
        $select=$table->select();
        if(isset($this->bindings[$name]["key"])){
          eval(implode("",zparser::criteria($this->bindings[$name]["key"])));
          return $table->fetchRow($select);
        } else {
          if(isset($this->bindings[$name]["where"])) eval(implode("",zparser::criteria($this->bindings[$name]["where"])));
          return $table->fetchAll($select);
        }
      } else {
        if(isset($this->bindings[$name]["connection"])) require_once("../model/".$this->bindings[$name]["connection"].".php");
        else require_once("../model/connection.php");
        $db = Zend_Db_Table_Abstract::getDefaultAdapter();
        $stmt = $db->query($this->resolve($this->bindings[$name]["query"]));
        return $stmt->fetchAll();
      }
    } else {
      return $_SESSION[$this->bindingValuesId][$name];
    }
  }
  function __set($name, $value){
    if(isset($this->bindings[$name])) {
      if(isset($this->bindings[$name]["class"])) {
      }
    } else {
      $_SESSION[$this->bindingValuesId][$name] = $value;
    }
  }
  function __replace__($__match__)
  {
    return eval("return {$__match__[1]};");
  }
  function resolve($exp)
  {
    $res = preg_replace_callback('/\\'."\x7b".'([^\\'."\x7d".']+)\\'."\x7d".'/', array($this,'__replace__'), $exp);
    return $res;
  }
}

function jencode($o){
  $j=json_encode($o);
  return preg_replace_callback('/"&([^"\\\\]|\\.)*"/', create_function('$m', 'return substr(json_decode($m[0]),1);'), $j);
}

dbfunction($phpvariable); field2 = @phpfunction($phpvariable); field3 = @phpfn(phpconstant) * convertion: * $select->where('field1 > dbfunction(?)',$phpvariable); * $select->where('field2 = ?',phpfunction($phpvariable)); * $select->where('field3 = ?',phpfn(phpconstant)); */ public static function criteria($criteria,$select='$select'){ $res=array(); if(isset($criteria)) { $token = token_get_all('propiedad for($j=$i+1;$j<$l;$j++){ if(is_string($token[$j])) {$e=$token[$j];$k=0;} else {$e=$token[$j][1];$k=$token[$j][0];} if(trim($e)=="") {} elseif(@$e=="->") $cont[]=array(307,309); elseif(@$e=="[") $cont[]=array("]"); elseif(@$e=="(") $cont[]=array(")"); elseif(count($cont)==0) break; elseif(count($cont)>0){ foreach($cont as $kco => $co){ foreach($co as $coi){ if($coi===$e || ($coi==$k && !is_string($coi))){ $lasti=$j; unset($cont[$kco]); } } } } } $var=""; for($j=$i;$j<=$lasti;$j++) $var.=is_string($token[$j])?$token[$j]:$token[$j][1]; $vars[]=$var; //print("");var_dump($var);print(""); $i=$lasti; } elseif(is_array($t)) { $exp.=$t[1]; } elseif($t==";") { if(trim($exp)) { $exp=var_export($exp,true); if($vars){ $xvars=$vars; foreach($xvars as &$xvar) $xvar=var_export("'.{$select}->getAdapter()->quote($xvar).'",true); $xvars[0]='"?"'; eval('$exp=sprintf($exp,'.implode(',',$xvars).');'); $res[]="{$select}->where($exp,$vars[0]);\n"; } else { $res[]="{$select}->where($exp);\n"; } } $vars=array(); $exp=""; } } } return $res; } public static function parse($str,$separator=';'){ $res=''; if(isset($str)) { $tks=array(); $token = token_get_all('0){ foreach($cont0 as $kco => $co){ foreach($co as $coi){ if($coi===$e || ($coi==$k && !is_string($coi))){ unset($cont0[$kco]); } } } } if(is_string($t) && $t!=$separator && $t!="@") $tk[]=array(0,$t); elseif($t==="@" || (is_array($t) && $t[0]==T_VARIABLE)){ $cont=$t=="@"?array(array(307,309)):array(); if($t=="@")$i++; $lasti=$i; //$i+1 para: $this->propiedad for($j=$i;$j<$l;$j++){ if(is_string($token[$j])) {$e=$token[$j];$k=0;} else {$e=$token[$j][1];$k=$token[$j][0];} //Verifica -> () [] y {} en la expresion php if(trim($e)=="") {} elseif(@$e=="->") $cont[]=array(307,309); elseif(@$e=="[") $cont[]=array("]"); elseif(@$e=="(") $cont[]=array(")"); elseif(@$e=="{") $cont[]=array("}"); elseif(count($cont)==0) break; elseif(count($cont)>0){ foreach($cont as $kco => $co){ foreach($co as $coi){ if($coi===$e || ($coi==$k && !is_string($coi))){ $lasti=$j; unset($cont[$kco]); } } } } } $var=""; for($j=$i;$j<=$lasti;$j++) $var.=is_string($token[$j])?$token[$j]:$token[$j][1]; $tk[]=array(1,$var); $i=$lasti; } elseif(is_array($t)) { $tk[]=array(0,$t[1]); } elseif($t==$separator && (count($cont0)==0)) { //valid separator if(count($tk)) $tks[]=$tk; $tk=array(); } else { //invalid separador $tk[]=array(0,$t); } } } return $tks; } protected static function quote($xvar,$select='$select'){ return "{$select}->getAdapter()->quote($xvar)"; } protected static function quoteIdentifier($xvar,$select='$select'){ return "{$select}->getAdapter()->quoteIdentifier($xvar)"; } /** * Parse from */ public static function from($columns,$select='$select'){ $tks = zparser::parse($columns,','); $cols=array(); foreach($tks as $tk){ $res='';$exp=''; foreach($tk as $i=>$t){ if($t[0]==1){ //php $res.="'.".zparser::quoteIdentifier($t[1],$select).".'"; } elseif(strtoupper($t[1])=="AS") { $exp = $res; $res=''; } else { //sql $res.=substr(var_export($t[1],true),1,-1); } } if($exp){ //alias $cols[]="array('".trim($res)."'=>'".trim($exp)."')"; } else { $cols[]="'$res'"; } } $res=array(); foreach($cols as $t){ $t=str_replace(array("''.",".''"),"",$t); $res[]="{$select}->from($t);"; } return $res; } /** * Parse Columns */ public static function columns($columns,$select='$select'){ $tks = zparser::parse($columns,','); $cols=array(); foreach($tks as $tk){ $res='';$exp=''; $quoter="quote"; foreach($tk as $i=>$t){ if($t[0]==1){ //php $res.="'.".zparser::$quoter($t[1],$select).".'"; } elseif(strtoupper($t[1])=="AS") { $exp = $res; $res=''; $quoter="quoteIdentifier"; } else { //sql $res.=substr(var_export($t[1],true),1,-1); } } if($exp){ //alias and expression: new Zend_Db_Expr('p.cost * 1.08') === '(p.cost * 1.08)' $cols[]="array(".str_replace(array("''.",".''"),"","'".trim($res)."'")."=>'(".trim($exp).")')"; } else { $cols[]="'$res'"; } } $res=array(); foreach($cols as $c){ $t=str_replace(array("''.",".''"),"",$c); $res[]="{$select}->columns($c);"; } return $res; } }

<?php
require_once("../library/freeness/components/form.class.php");

class freeness_modules_login extends freeness_components_form {
  var $title = "Hola Mundo";
  var $action = "verifyLogin";
  var $bindings = array(
    'user'=>array(
      'class'=>'user',
      'key'=>'usr_login=$user; usr_password=@md5($password)',
    ),
  );
  var $fields = array(
    array("name"=>"user","type"=>"text","label"=>"Usuario"),
    array("name"=>"password","type"=>"password","label"=>"Password"),
  );
  var $buttons = array(
    array("label"=>"Ingresar"),
  );
  
  function verifyLogin($user,$password){
    $row = $this->getBinding("user");
    if(isset($row)) {
      print(json_encode(array("success"=>true,"action"=>"location.href='../desktop/index'")));
    } else {
      print(json_encode(array("success"=>false)));
    }
  }
}

<?php
require_once("../library/freeness/components/form.class.php");

class freeness_modules_editlogin extends freeness_components_form {
  var $title = "Perfil del Usuario";
  var $action = "saveProfile";
  var $user = "";
  var $bindings = array(
    'user'=>array(
      'class'=>'user',
      'key'=>'usr_login=$this->user',
    ),
  );
  var $fields = array(
    array("name"=>"usr_email","type"=>"text","label"=>"Email"),
    array("name"=>"password","type"=>"password","label"=>"Password"),
  );
  var $buttons = array(
    array("label"=>"Guardar"),
  );
  
  function __construct(){
    parent::__construct();
    $this->user = $_SESSION["freeness_modules_login"]["user"];
  }
  function saveProfile(){
    $row = $this->getBinding("user");
    if(isset($row)) {
      print(json_encode(array("success"=>true,"action"=>"alert(".json_encode($row->usr_email).")")));
    } else {
      print(json_encode(array("success"=>false)));
    }
  }
}

<?php
require_once("../library/freeness/components/formpropertygrid.class.php");

class freeness_modules_auditoria extends freeness_components_formpropertygrid {
  var $title = "Auditoria";
  var $action = "";
  var $bindings = array(
    'preguntas'=>array(
      'class'=>'maestroauditoria',
      'where'=>'',
    ),
    'clientes'=>array(
      "query"=>'select gbagecage, gbagenomb
                from gbage, prdeu, prmpr
                where gbagecage  = prdeucage
                   and prdeunpre = prmprnpre
                   and prmprnpre = {isset($this->operacion)?$this->operacion:0}',
    ),
  );
  var $tbar=array(
    array("icon"=>"../../images/binoculars.gif"),
  );
  var $search = array(
    array("name"=>"operacion","type"=>"text","label"=>"Operacion"),
  );
  var $buttons = array(
    array("label"=>"Buscar"),
  );
  var $grids = array(
  );

  function __construct() {
    parent::__construct();
    $grilla = -1;
    foreach($this->preguntas as $preg) {
      if($preg->aumautipo=="N") {
        //PREGUNTAS N
        if($grilla<0) { $this->grids[]=array("title"=>"","width"=>380,"nameColumnWidth"=>300,"source"=>array()); $grilla=count($this->grids)-1; }
        $this->grids[$grilla]["source"][]=array(
          "name"=> 'A',
          "label"=> $preg->aumaudesc,
          "type"=> 'combo',
          "data"=> array(
            array("v"=>"A","d"=>"A"),
            array("v"=>"B","d"=>"B"),
            array("v"=>"C","d"=>"C"),
            array("v"=>"D","d"=>"D"),
            array("v"=>"E","d"=>"E"),
            array("v"=>"F","d"=>"F"),
            array("v"=>"G","d"=>"G"),
          )
        );
      } else {
        //PREGUNTAS D
        $this->grids[]=array("title"=>$preg->aumaudesc,"width"=>380,"nameColumnWidth"=>300,"source"=>array()); $grilla=count($this->grids)-1;
        foreach($this->clientes as $cli) {
          $this->grids[$grilla]["source"][]=array(
            "name"=> 'P'.$cli["gbagecage"],
            "label"=> $cli["gbagenomb"],
            "type"=> 'combo',
            "data"=> array(
            array("v"=>"A","d"=>"A"),
            array("v"=>"B","d"=>"B"),
            array("v"=>"C","d"=>"C"),
            array("v"=>"D","d"=>"D"),
            array("v"=>"E","d"=>"E"),
            array("v"=>"F","d"=>"F"),
            array("v"=>"G","d"=>"G"),
            )
          );
        }
        $grilla=-1;
      }
    }
  }

  function onsearch(){
    
  }
}
